General.Name: Wonbang Tech Co. Ltd.
General.Description: K-Ensol Co., Ltd. engages in the engineering business in South Korea. Its Construction division constructs industrial cleanrooms, biological cleanrooms, dry rooms, and HVAC and utility facilities. The company's Engineering division provides HVAC design, outdoor air control unit (OAC) information modeling, energy diagnosis consulting, structure analysis, and thermal/floating analysis services. Its Manufacturing division provides ceiling systems, such as clean equipment, including fan filter units, HEPA/ULPA filters, and blind panels, etc.; OAC units and air handling units; clean equipment; VOC-solvers; desiccant dehumidifiers; TDL and panel type lighting products; water showering systems; plenum moisturizing systems; and sound-proof facilities. The company was formerly known as Wonbang Tech Co., Ltd. and changed its name to K-Ensol Co., Ltd. in June 2023. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
